about_the_game:
Set Contents

This is a handy collection of character data that is great for depicting a fantasy world!

8 classes are included in this collection: warrior, fighter, hunter, assassin, wizard, merchant, monk, and necromancer.
Standing pictures, window icons, and walking graphics that can be used in a variety of worldviews are included!

Contents

characters: 2 sheets
faces: 8 on 1 sheets
pictures: 8


・This pack is for use in Maker Series ONLY
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・Rights must be indicated when using assets.
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
・All copyrights, neighboring rights, and all other rights to this material belong to the creator or a third party authorized by the creator.
